channel.title: Object-Oriented patterns
channel.description:
Great site a friend showed me a while ago. Decided to post it here as it could help some of you guys practice good habits while programming any high level language.
http://www.oodesign.com/
Some patterns I find useful:
Singleton pattern Chain of responsibility pattern Adapter pattern Command pattern

item.title: Object-Oriented patterns
item.dc:creator: @_Discardedx2 `Discardedx2
item.description:
@_Discardedx2 wrote:

Great site a friend showed me a while ago. Decided to post it here as it could help some of you guys practice good habits while programming any high level language.

Design Patterns | Object Oriented Design

Design Patterns | Object Oriented Design

By definition, Design Patterns are reusable solutions to commonly occuring problems(in the context of software design). Design patterns were started as best practices that were applied again and again to similar problems encountered in different...

Some patterns I find useful:

Singleton pattern
Chain of responsibility pattern
Adapter pattern
Command pattern

Read full topic
